<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="x_1307894_cmms_model"> <x_1307894_cmms_model action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <active>true</active> <aem_approved_date/> <alarms/> <asset_type display_value="Water Softener Tank Filtered">09ef346d93314210397dbd6cebba10ce</asset_type> <assigned_to/> <classification/> <display_name/> <eol_date/> <identifier/> <internal_notes/> <known_as/> <last_pm_review_date>2022-12-07</last_pm_review_date> <maintenance>Schedules: monthly, 6 month, 2 year Procedures: Monthly General cleaning check for leaks
Perform following monthly procedure per water management company: 1. Open the bottom valve or bottom drain of the heat exchanger or tank, and allow water to evacuate for 10-seconds. Representative photos are provided below. 2. Repeat above step 2-more times (3-times total), or until water exiting the tank is clear, showing no signs of sludge or debris present.
approved by D. Kuchner 2/16/22
6 month Check condition of carbon filtration media and replace as needed
2 year Check and remove build up of sediments, iron, foreign materials as needed from Pilot valve assembly Brunermatic valve Pilot strainer Check and remove build up of sediment, iron, other foreign materials as needed from backwash flow controller
Performed by: scripps tech</maintenance> <maintenance_intervals/> <maintenance_standard>Matches other non-regulatory requirement</maintenance_standard> <maintenance_strategy>Preventive/Scheduled</maintenance_strategy> <manufacturer display_value="Culligan Water">86f63ced93fd0210397dbd6cebba10e8</manufacturer> <model_name>01017286</model_name> <model_number>01017286</model_number> <network_capability/> <phi_storage/> <picture/> <probability>1</probability> <processed_by/> <proposed_on/> <proposer_reviewed/> <reason_for_no_pm/> <references/> <risk/> <risk_score>2</risk_score> <severity>2</severity> <state>Active</state> <sub_state/> <sys_class_name>x_1307894_cmms_model</sys_class_name> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2024-04-26 03:24:02</sys_created_on> <sys_id>3cb3ed2d93f14210397dbd6cebba109e</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>8</sys_mod_count> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2024-04-26 19:51:40</sys_updated_on> <system/> <udi/> <useful_life_yrs/> <website/> </x_1307894_cmms_model> </record_update>
